Package LimakWebApp.ServerSide

Class DiskMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • LimakWebApp.ServerSide.DiskMap

  • public class DiskMap
extends java.lang.Object

    DiskMap

    This class is used by MainPageController to show dependencies between users and files stored on server
    Since:
    12.08.2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kamil Chrustowski
